# www.paiafinance.com llms.txt

> Paia finance is the official and exclusive distributor of crypto and forex licenses for the ministry of finance, union of comoros. Facilitates licensing and regulatory services for crypto, forex, and fintech companies through trusted compliance solutions and licensing distribution in Comoros.

- [Forex & Crypto Licences](https://www.paiafinance.com/why-us): Promote licensing services for forex and crypto companies in Comoros and other global financial hubs.
- [Forex & Crypto Licensing](https://www.paiafinance.com/services): Offer licensing services for Forex and Crypto in Comoros, including application guidance and compliance solutions.
- [Privacy Policy](https://www.paiafinance.com/privacy-policy): Details PAIA Finance's privacy practices and data handling policies.
- [Crypto & Forex Licensing](https://www.paiafinance.com): Promote licensing and regulatory services for crypto and forex businesses in Comoros.
- [PaiaFinance Contact](https://www.paiafinance.com/contact-us): Contact and get support from PaiaFinance for financial solutions.
